title: Mat Kerekes from Citizen
itunes:title: Mat Kerekes from Citizen
description:
I have a SUPERSIZED episode for you today with not one, but two chats! The first is a quickie w/ Ty Brooks from melodic hardcore band Conveyor talking about tour life and Eau Claire, WI. Then, we unleash the awesome conversation with Mat Kerekes from Citizen. We get SUPER nerdy about video games, online criticism and his relationship with touring. Pull up a chair and hang out for a bit. Step your wardrobe up by getting AMAZING clothes, underwear and more with Mack Weldon. Real talk, the best in the game. Get 20% off by using the code WORDS at checkout. Go into Binge Mode with Audible and get $50 off their gold membership!Pre-Order the new Conveyer entitled NO FUTURE today!Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
